snippet: Doubleday said that this book, coming on May 14, would again focus on the heroic Harvard professor Robert Langdon and would chronicle his adventures "in the heart of Europe," where he "is drawn into a harrowing world centered on one of history's most...
abstract: Doubleday said that this book, coming on May 14, would again focus on the heroic Harvard professor Robert Langdon and would chronicle his adventures "in the heart of Europe," where he "is drawn into a harrowing world centered on one of history's most enduring and mysterious literary masterpieces."

headline.main: New Dan Brown Novel Coming in May
headline.print_headline: New Dan Brown Novel Is Coming in May
